key_risks: Regulatory and legal risks, including environmental and workplace safety violations
Supply chain vulnerabilities due to global dependencies
Dependence on acquisitions for growth, with integration and overpayment risks
Spin-off risks from the separation of the Environmental & Applied Solutions segment
Pricing pressures in diagnostics and life sciences markets
controversies: Multiple regulatory penalties, including EPA and OSHA fines
Shareholder derivative lawsuit regarding board diversity, later dismissed
environmental_issues: Environmental violations, including a $48,215 EPA fine in 2020
Post-acquisition due diligence at Pall Corporation revealed environmental violations
social_issues: Workplace safety violations, including a $23,435 OSHA fine in 2023
Community Impact strategy to enhance social contributions globally
governance_issues: Board diversity lawsuit, highlighting scrutiny of corporate governance practices
